string.text: Nice suit, bro. It's not too hard to make some upgrades to it - I have everything I need for the suit, but show me you're serious. Bring me a rare artifact and I'll upgrade your suit.
One of my artifact hunters had some mildly bad luck yesterday. Climbed the Oakpine and pulled out some nice artifacts, but dropped his binoculars into the pit. Poor him! Do you have any spares?
